1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Operators on data resources.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat.Resource
6  ( ropsResource,
7    -- * koshu-res-rop
8    consKoshuResRop, relkitKoshuResRop,
9    -- * koshu-res-sink
10    consKoshuResSink, relkitKoshuResSink,
11    -- * koshu-res-article
12    consKoshuResArticle, relkitKoshuResArticle,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture       as O
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base           as B
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax         as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data           as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core           as C
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base       as Rop
21
22
23-- | Relmap operators about resources.
24ropsResource :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
25ropsResource = Rop.ropList "resource"
26    --        CONSTRUCTOR           USAGE                       ATTRIBUTE
27    [ Rop.rop consKoshuResArticle [ "koshu-res-article /N"  O.& "-name" ]
28    , Rop.rop consKoshuResRop     [ "koshu-res-rop /N /N"   O.& "-sec -name" ]
29    , Rop.rop consKoshuResSink    [ "koshu-res-sink /N /N"  O.& "-sec -pat" ]
30    , Rop.rop Rop.consXxx         [ "koshu-res-source /N"   O.& "-pat" ]
31    , Rop.rop Rop.consXxx         [ "koshu-res-sink-source /N /N" O.& "-sink -source" ]
32    ]
33
34
35-- ----------------------  koshu-res-rop
36
37-- | __koshu-res-rop \/N \/N__
38--
39--   Derived relmap operators in the current resource.
40--
41consKoshuResRop :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
42consKoshuResRop med =
43  do sec   <- Rop.getTerm med "-sec"
44     name  <- Rop.getTerm med "-name"
45     Right $ relmapKoshuResRop med (sec, name)
46
47-- | Create @koshu-res-rop@ relmap.
48relmapKoshuResRop :: (D.CContent c)
49    => C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, S.TermName)
50    -> C.Relmap c
51relmapKoshuResRop med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuResRop
52
53-- | Create @koshu-res-rop@ relkit.
54relkitKoshuResRop :: (D.CContent c)
55    => (S.TermName, S.TermName)
56    -> C.RelkitHook c
57relkitKoshuResRop (sec, name) res _ = Right kit2 where
58    kit2  = C.relkitConstBody ns bo2
59    ns    = [sec, name]
60    bo2   = f `map` C.resLexmap res
61    f ((s, n), _) = [D.pInt s, D.pText n]
62
63
64-- ----------------------  koshu-res-sink
65
66-- | __koshu-res-sink \/N \/N__
67--
68--   Judgement class of sinks in the current resource.
69--
70consKoshuResSink :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
71consKoshuResSink med =
72  do sec   <- Rop.getTerm med "-sec"
73     pat   <- Rop.getTerm med "-pat"
74     Right $ relmapKoshuResSink med (sec, pat)
75
76-- | Create @koshu-res-sink@ relmap.
77relmapKoshuResSink :: (D.CContent c)
78    => C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, S.TermName)
79    -> C.Relmap c
80relmapKoshuResSink med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuResSink
81
82-- | Create @koshu-res-sink@ relkit.
83relkitKoshuResSink :: (D.CContent c)
84    => (S.TermName, S.TermName)
85    -> C.RelkitHook c
86relkitKoshuResSink (sec, pat) res _ = Right kit2 where
87    kit2  = C.relkitConstBody ns bo2
88    ns    = [sec, pat]
89    g a   = [D.pInt $ C.assSection a, D.pText $ C.assClass a]
90    f     = g . S.shortBody
91    bo2   = f `map` C.resAssert res
92
93
94-- ----------------------  koshu-res-article
95
96-- | __koshu-res-article \/N__
97consKoshuResArticle :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
98consKoshuResArticle med =
99  do name <- Rop.getTerm med "-name"
100     Right $ relmapKoshuResArticle med name
101
102-- | Create @koshu-res-article@ relmap.
103relmapKoshuResArticle :: (D.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> S.TermName -> C.Relmap c
104relmapKoshuResArticle med = C.relmapHook med . relkitKoshuResArticle
105
106-- | Create @koshu-res-article@ relkit.
107relkitKoshuResArticle :: (D.CContent c) => S.TermName -> C.RelkitHook c
108relkitKoshuResArticle name res _ = Right kit2 where
109    kit2  = C.relkitConstBody ns bo2
110    ns    = [name]
111    f s   = [D.pText $ B.ioPointText $ B.nioPoint s]
112    bo2   = f `map` C.resIncluded res
113
